document.full_text: al qaeda released a posthumous audio recording by osama bin laden in which he praised revolutions sweeping through several arab countries, and called for more muslim "tyrants" to be toppled.
document.title: al qaeda releases posthumous bin laden audio recording
lines_and_colors: al qaeda released a posthumous audio recording by osama bin laden in which he praised revolutions sweeping through several arab countries, and called for more muslim "tyrants" to be toppled.
